name: Dr. Vinay Kumar
about: Dr. Vinay Kumar has a strong commitment to delivering comprehensive medical care to individuals and families. With expertise in diagnosing and treating a wide range of acute and chronic conditions, he focuses on preventive health, lifestyle management, and patient education to ensure long-term wellness.

name: Dr. Meena Rathi
about: Dr. Meena Rathi is dedicated to promoting overall wellness with a focus on chronic disease management and lifestyle guidance.

name: Dr. Ankit Mehra
about: Dr. Ankit Mehra specializes in digestive disorders with a strong emphasis on personalized diet and treatment plans.

name: Dr. Rahul Sen
about: Dr. Rahul Sen focuses on treating liver and intestinal disorders using minimally invasive procedures.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
about: Dr. Priya Sharma offers comprehensive care in obstetrics and gynecology with a compassionate approach.

name: Dr. Snehith Kapoor
about: Dr. Snehith Kapoor is committed to ensuring safe pregnancies and promoting reproductive health for all women.

name: Dr. Rakesh Nair
about: Dr. Rakesh Nair specializes in neurological disorders and provides advanced care for epilepsy, stroke, and migraines.

name: Dr. Ritesh Saxena
about: Dr. Ritesh Saxena is focused on treating disorders of the brain and spine with a personalized treatment approach.

name: Dr. Sneha Reddy
about: Dr. Sneha Reddy is dedicated to the care and development of children from infancy to adolescence.

name: Dr. Arvind Menon
about: Dr. Arvind Menon provides child-friendly, evidence-based care for all pediatric concerns including immunization.

name: Dr. Arpitha Malhotra
about: Dr. Arpitha Malhotra offers expert care for skin, hair, and nail conditions with a focus on cosmetic dermatology.

name: Dr. Nishith Verma
about: Dr. Nishith Verma is known for her expertise in acne, pigmentation, and anti-aging treatments.

name: Dr. Amala Joshi
about: Dr. Amala Joshi is skilled in managing acute illnesses and promoting preventive health through lifestyle coaching.

name: Dr. Kamal Iyer
about: Dr. Kamal Iyer provides expert care for childrenâ€™s growth, behavioral health, and nutritional needs.

name: Dr. Kavita Bhatia
about: Dr. Kavita Bhatia is an experienced neurologist focused on stroke rehabilitation and neurodegenerative disorders.
